bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Fragment of minutes from a meeting of the Medical Society of the District of Columbia, November 3, 1926

div1.p: This agenda concerns a proposal to raise money for a Walter Reed chair at the University of Virginia and the restoration of the Walter Reed birthplace.

div1.head: Fragment of minutes from a meeting of the Medical Society of the District of Columbia, November 3, 1926
div1.opener:
MEDICAL SOCIETY of the DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
1718 M Street
(Telephone: Franklin 284)
STATED MEETING
{WEDNESDAY, NOVEMBER 3rd, 1926- 8 P.M.}
div1.p:
The following recommendations from the Executive Commit-
tee will be considered:

1. That the President be authorized to appoint a Committee
of ten to act with similar committees to be appoint-
ed by the Virginia State Medical Society to the end
that funds may be collected for establishing a
Walter Reed Chair at the University of Virginia, and
also, to restore the Walter Reed Homestead in
Gloucester County, Virginia.
